page.title: 04Penrhyn Castle
page.content: There are over 200 rooms in the castle but the public can visit only 13. The castle is open from April when the season starts to September when the season ends. The castle is open from 12 midday to 5pm,everyday except Tuesdays. It costs Â£1.00 to get in for adults and 60p for children. The land was split up into parts owned by Penrhyn Castle,Penrhyn Estates and The National Trust. There are many trains in the Railway Museum,most are quarry trains,some from the Penrhyn quarries. The Pennant family had their own carriage elaborately furnished so that when the family wanted to go down to the quarries they could travel in comfort. It was not like that for the workmen who had small cramped trucks.
